Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io.sink

Class DataSinkBuilder

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.sink.DataSinkBuilder
public class DataSinkBuilder extends Object
This class knows how to take an @link{EnumerableDataSource} and write it to a variety of different targets.
Author:
John Grimes

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
      saveMode - the save mode to use
      Returns:
      this builder for method chaining

    • ndjson

      public void ndjson(@Nullable String path)
      Writes the data in the data source to NDJSON files, one per resource type and named using the "ndjson" extension.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory to write the files to

    • ndjson

      public void ndjson(@Nullable String path, @Nullable UnaryOperator<String> fileNameMapper)
      Writes the data in the data source to NDJSON files, one per resource type and named using a custom file name mapper.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory to write the files to
      fileNameMapper - a function that maps a resource type to a file name

    • parquet

      public void parquet(@Nullable String path)
      Writes the data in the data source to Parquet files, one per resource type and named using the "parquet" extension.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory to write the files to

    • parquet

      public void parquet(@Nullable String path, @Nullable UnaryOperator<String> fileNameMapper)
      Writes the data in the data source to Parquet files, one per resource type and named using a custom file name mapper.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory to write the files to
      fileNameMapper - a function that maps a resource type to a file name

    • delta

      public void delta(@Nullable String path)
      Writes the data in the data source to a Delta database.

      public void delta(@Nullable String path, @Nullable UnaryOperator<String> fileNameMapper)
      Writes the data in the data source to a Delta database, named using a custom file name mapper.
      Parameters:
      path - the directory to write the files to
      fileNameMapper - a function that maps a resource type to a file name

    • tables

      public void tables()
      Writes the data in the data source to tables within the Spark catalog, named according to the resource type.

    • tables

      public void tables(@Nullable String schema)
      Writes the data in the data source to tables within the Spark catalog, named according to the resource type and prefixed with the provided schema name.
      Parameters:
      schema - the schema name to write the tables to

    • tables

      public void tables(@Nullable String schema, @Nullable String format)
      Writes the data in the data source to tables within the Spark catalog, named according to the resource type, using the specified format.
      Parameters:
      schema - the schema name to write the tables to
      format - the table format to use (e.g., "delta", "parquet")
